text: Tucumcari is a city in the U.S. state of New Mexico. It was founded in 1901 and is the county seat of Quay County. == References == == Other websites == * City of Tucumcari * Tucumcari Chamber of Commerce * Eastern Plains Community Action Agency (Early Head Start and Head Start) * Mesalands Community College Category:Cities in New Mexico Category:County seats in New Mexico Category:1901 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in New Mexico Territory
title: Tucumcari, New Mexico
